product_name: CygoLite Dash 320 and Hotshot Micro Bike Light Set
long_description: A powerful bike light combo set, the Dash 320 illuminates your path while the Hotshot Micro 2W rear light alerts riders and motorists behind you to your presence, keeping you visible while riding.
short_description: A powerful bike light combo set, the Dash 320 illuminates your path while the Hotshot Micro 2W rear light alerts riders and motorists behind you to your presence, keeping you visible while riding.
